attributes.action: urge Lucy Duncan to do the hokey cokey each Monday @ 10am
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Firstly she would be required to put her left leg in, her left leg out, in, out, in, out, then shake it all about.
This would then continue with the right leg, both arms and finally her whole self.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
